projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

/ ratnānāṃ varṇasya [2b4] tīrthyānām avarṇasya bhūtasyoktāv akupyatvamārādhitacittatā /
/ tadartham atadvan tam enaṃ kṛtopāsakatāntaṃ caturo māsān parivāsayed* saṃgho datvā parivāsaṃ karmaṇā /
/ nonam asamarthaṃ kākoḍḍāyane samartham vā [2b5] saptavarṣaṃ pravrajayeyuḥ /
/ aruciś ced anekadhyaṃ pravrajyāyāṃ pravrajyātiriktam upasam*pādayet* /

/ kṛtānujñāte so mātapitṛbhyām ante muktvā dūradeśakaṃ /
/ mā te glānyaṃ kañcid astīti vā /
/ antyasyātra doṣabhaktau nāśanaṃ / steyasaṃvāsikaḥ / jānato kṛtatāṃ vidher upasaṃpado prarūḍhatām vā dvitīyāyāṃ saṃghe na sā[3a2]rdhaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhūtatāyāṃ tatvaṃ /

/ caturṇāṃ [3a3] pārajikānām anyat tam āpattim āpannaḥ /
/ bhyupapataḥ syāc cet sāmagrī punaḥ praṇidhānaṃ /

/ [41b5] niravadyaṃ srāddhasya pradhānasya ca tuṣṭisaṃbhāvanāyām ācārānuśrāvaṇam* /

/ so ktagandhaiś cāṅgerīpaṭalakagate śukle vāsasy upanikṣiptāḥ śalākā vṛddhānte niveśyā yañ cāyaṃ cāsminn āvāse kriyākāro yo yusmākam utsahate tena kriyākāreṇāsminn āvāse varṣāvastuṃ sa śalākāṃ grihṇātu na ca vaḥ kenacid antarvarṣe saṃghamadhye raṇam utpā[42a2]dayitavyo yo vaḥ kasyacit kiñcij jānāti sa idānīṃ* vadanta yo [[vo]] ntarvarṣe saṃghe raṇam utpādayiṣyati tasya saṃgha uttara upaparīkṣitavyaṃ matsyata iti bhikṣūn vedayeta /

/ grahaṇopaśamanaṃ prati saṃghaṃ jñapayed anyaḥ /

/ gaṇayitvā pravedanam iyadbhir bhikṣubhir asminn āvāse śalākā gṛhīteti /

/ varṣopagamane syuḥ kecid āgantava iti vastu śayanāsanañ ca sthāpayeyuḥ /
/ pūrvāhṇe kvacit pāṭhasvādhyāyāvasthānacaṃkramāṇāṃ kvacid madhyāhne paratrānyatra [[pātra]]cīvarasthāpanam āvāso paratra rātrāv ity asya yogaḥ /
/ ayam amutrartāv ahaurātre tadavayave vā bhaviṣyaty ayam amutrāyām ācāryasya bhaviṣyaty ayam upādhyāyasya sā[42b3]rdham vihāriṇo yam ayam antevāsina ālaptakāder ayam iti vihārān nuddiśeyuḥ /

/ amukena dānapatināmukena vaiyyapṛtyakareṇāmukena gocaragrāmakena svaḥ saṃgho varṣā upagamiṣyatīty ārocayet* /

/ anunmāditvaprativinoditvayoḥ kaukṛtyasyānyasya ca duḥkhadaurmanasyasya
sukhasaumanasyasya cotyāditvānurakṣitvayoḥ
glānopasthāyakatvasya ca [42b6] sabrahmacāriṣu bhūteḥ
pratyāśaṃsanenāvāsaṃ gocarañ ca piṇḍakabhaiṣajyadātror
avalokyopagamanam* /
/ na yasminn abhikṣukatvam akapāṭakatvañ ca sahitam* /
/ laṅghayed etad bhaktabhaiṣajyopasthāyakābhāve śaktau tair vinā yāpayitum* /
/ na kurvīt* nāsty asyaikapoṣadhatāyām āvāsayor utthānam* /

/ parasyāntaiḥ prākkarmato dhamyayā viniścayakathayā rātrer atināmanam* /

/ sarvasaṃghena prativārite etat tvasya saṃghe nivedanam* /
/ sādhu pravāritaṃ suṣṭhu pravāritam iti /

/ yena tenāsūceḥ /

bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pravārayitum iti /

/ sthāpanena nantyatām upanīya /
/ na haiva vayam āyusmann ity arthaṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipattitāḥ kaccid āyusman* vastu sthāpayen na putgalam ity api tu śīlaviśuddhyarthaṃ poṣadha ukto bhagavatā dharmathiśuddhyarthaṃ pravāraṇā saāced ākāṃ[44a2]kṣasi pravārayeti /

abhaṅgaḥ pratīṣṭaiḥ vyapalāpe sthāpanasya pratīṣṭatāyā sthāpitasya vā /
/ naivaṃvidhaṃ kiñcid astītivāde mṛṣātvam atra pūrvasyāsya vā /
/ kalikṛtāñ cet bhikṣūṇām āganam upagatāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ dvitripoṣadhātikrāntiś cet pravārayeyuḥ /

/ gandhapuṣpārcitaṃ surabhidhūpadhūpita cāṃgeripaṭalakastham ekaṃ trivānekam ādāya vṛddhā[44b5]nte vasthitenāstṛtes sampādanaṃ pratipadiḥ /

/ kṛte py atretarair eṣām āvāse lābhe rhatvam* /
/ bhavati chandadānavaśāt sahitena karaṇīyasya śiṣṭaiḥ kṛtau kṛtatvam* /
/ tasmād a[45a4]datvā cchandaṃ svapnasamāpatyoḥ saṃniṣaṇṇe syānutthānam āstārasyoddhṛteś ca prāk śruvaṇāt* /

/ nainaṃ sāṃghikam akhaṭamaṃcapīṭhamapratyāstṛtamatenāniṣādāt saṃvaraṇaṃ vā dattāntarddhānam upabhuñjīta /
/ pañcānāṃ labheḥ bhājane karaṇam adyalābho bhājayiṣyate tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sannipatitavyam ity ārocanaṃ saṃghe /
/ naikatvam arddhasya suvarutā ca labdher anarhapraveśe kāraṇaṃ /
/ uṣitatvaṃ bahutaram uṣitasya tatkālake lābhe hānāyāsyāvṛttau mṛtyau ca /
/ kasyacit tataḥ saṃghavṛddhanavakayoḥ dānaṃ tad ākhyaṃ /
/ sīmāntarikāt sthalagne kāye nyatra vā yātāmā[46a3]krāntis tāvad gatānāṃ /
/ antargṛhasthatve pātracīvarasya yasmai gṛhapatinā dānaṃ tasyaiśitvam /
/ yat tena sā[46a5]rddham avasthitaṃ tasya deyatvaṃ grāhyatā vā na tasyaiva /
/ ratnā dīpitvaṃ saṃbhāvane yāvadbhya etat tāvatsu nāvakarmikasya viniyogaḥ samaṃ sa glānopasthāyakrātvatadgāmitvaṃ pariskāraṣaṭkasya nādhiṣṭheyatvam /
/ hāyate glānasyoktoktena dāne yathoktena dāne yathoktaṃ kāryatvaṃ /
/ sa cced anyad etat tadaṃśatvenārthiriktatve pi na ced evam eva buddhe muktānāṃ /

/ yathārham anyasya sāṃghikasya nikṣepabhājanaṃ bhojanāni kṣetragṛhāpaṇaśayanāsanāyapaskāralohanāpitakulālatakṣā ca varuoḍabhāṇḍadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣayagomahiṣyajaiḍakabhaiṣajyabuddhaśāstrapustakānāṃ susādhyalekhā[46b3]nāṃ prathamārhatvaṃ /
/ na rajakena raktam araktaṃ vā vastraṃ śocayet /
/ na medhyāṃ caṃkrame vā raṅgakarma kuryuḥ /

/ nāsaṃpannakalpākoṭitapratyākoṭitacīvaraparibhukti bhajet /
/ bhaṅgo mṛṣṭer atra kalpaḥ /
/ pānīye na bollitatvaṃ /
/ avaśyāya pariśudhe śakyataratvaṃ hastam ardhena bhagasya /
/ [47a5] nivāsitasyoparikāyasya bandhanam /
/ paṭṭikayākhothikayāṅkuñcakena muñcikayā vā /
/ nānābharaṇakalāpakāt duṇḍhubhakāvaidehakāsu varṇasūtrañ ca /
/ tadvac citraṃ /
/ nānāstarāyāṃ bhūmau cīvaraṃ nikṣipet /
/ kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /
/ lagnasya kaṣāyodakena kṣodamiśreṇa gate ma[47b2]yitvā mandamandam apanayanaṃ pūyaśoṇitasya ca /
/ kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ rañjanañ ca /
/ dharmyayā vā kathayādhvani gacched āryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
/ na vinaitayā durlabhākūpapānīye deśe cāgārikāṃ caret /
/ prasphoṭitacīvaro dhvagaḥ [47b5] snātavāṃ prakṣālitapāṇipādo vā gṛhītapānīyaḥ poccito pānakes tricīvaraṃ prāvṛtya śānteryāpatho vihāraṃ praviśet /
/ pidhvīyatāṃ dvāraṃ na deyaṃ mṛgayate nivāryo gṛhṇāna iti pratyā[47b6]yitasya pratīcchyāvyupekṣitavatopahṛtau viśvāsavastutāñ copanītena mamaivāyaṃ sahāya ityādi pratipādanayā dāsyatvam /
/ pariṣaṇḍādānam antasya cīvare dhvasto pratividhānaṃ ārāpadakais tatsaṃgrahaḥ /
/ parivāsyābhyavakāśe vṛkṣādy upari saptāṣṭānyahāni pañcāṣātīty aparaṃ śocayitvā śavacīvaraṃ bhuñjīt* /
/ pravedite smaśaniko ham ity upanimantritaḥ praveśaṃ vihārakulayoḥ paribhogañ cānutsṛṣṭasvīkārasya śmaśaniko bhajet* /
/ ūrṇāṃ saṇaṃ karpāsaṃ natukaṃ patramañjarīñ ca /
/ cakrasya darśanārthaṃ karaṇaṃ gharmavātavarṣopadraveṇāspṛṣṭyai kūpagārasya dvāravanta /
/ nānuddiśya dvayaṃ śāstṛpūjāyāṃ datte bhikṣuṇīnāṃ sāṃghike praveśaḥ /
/ tasyaivātra sannipātagatam anuṣṭheyaṃ saṃghasthavireṇa mūlyasya karaṇam /
/ [48b3] datte kasyacid avibhakte vaṅgān mṛtau tadvargyagāmitvaṃ tadaṃśasya /
/ arhati nirvāṇāśayena pravrajitaḥ śīlavāṃ śatasāhasraṃ vastraṃ śatarasaṃbhojanaṃ pañcasūtaṃ kūṭāgāram /
/ na cel lābhasya pātracīvarād atirekass amā[48b6]dāpya /
/ nāsāṃghāṭyāṃ chinnādhiṣṭhānaniyamaḥ nāsatve tadrūpāṇāṃ pratyayānām icchanna[49a1] / /yā grāmāntargṛhayor anayopaveśaḥ praveśaś ca /
/ na lomasya viheṭhe syānyathā prāvṛtiṃ bhajet* /
/ adhiṣṭhāya tattvenānujñātā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ dhārayed uparāṃ vikalpānekam api /

/ samyaktvaṃ saṃkhyam anuktau sāhyasya vyayacāyanikṣeptre dānam
na sānikṣepte manonunmattakā tajñātitadgṛhādātuṃ pratigṛhṇīt* /
/ grahaṇaṃ punar labdhau staupikasya vṛtter mū[49a6]laphalekṣubhyo nyasya bhaktārthasyoddeśopajīvyasya vā bhājyatvaṃ svīkārāya /
/ nānavachinnaṃ bhojanam anulābhe bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhuktavatve tatrāpraveśaḥ /
/ karaṇaṃ sabhikṣutāyām aśaktau teṣāṃ bhikṣuṇyā dakṣiṇādeśa[49b2]nasya sāmānyañ cārayiṣyatīti cārakam āhārasya pratyupasthitapādau dānāya saṃghasthaviro niyuñjīt /
/ yathāsaṃbhāvanam ity avalokya parṣadaṃ prabhūtyelpatve bhaktasya tadākhyānapūrvakaṃ /
/ na cānudghoṣite saṃprāptam iti vṛddhānta ādau gṛhṇīt /
/ pratidādyata ity ato nyena manasā saṃghaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt /
/ pūrveṇa puṇḍakaccho nāma dāvaḥ purataḥ puṇḍavardhanasya /
/ sapta padāny antato gṛhiṇā paribhukte bahupuṭau api /
/ piṇḍībhavajjane ca janapade kholāṃ pūlāṃ ca /
/ kakṣahastikhaṭuṃkāś ca tadanyacaṇḍamṛgān[[ṇ]]ām apy ebhir ākṣepaḥ /
/ atrāpy atra tadrūpeṣv api pratyayeṣv ani[50a2]pattavyatā pratigṛhṇīt tarkṣacarma cakṣuṣe /
/ vāte niṣadyā nipadyā ca sarvam arśaḥsvetad ity asyopayogaḥ /
/ na nābhijñāstaraṇe kṛtvā savidhānam agādhamambho vagāhet* /
/ tadvac chuktaśulukadadhimaṇḍodaśvinmaṇḍakāni dakabhinnāni paṭṭapariśrutāni svacchāni mukhadarśīni śarakāṇḍavarṇāni /
/ ayuktiḥ prāg evaṃ [pa]ścād upasaṃpannena yarśanasya sa[50a5]mānavyaṃjanena /
/ atattvāt taddravyasya kālikaṃ ced anupasaṃpannena marddhanaṃ pariśrāvaṇañ ca paṭena /
/ tadasadatiriktakālāśritāvarūḍhiprāpte tasyāṃ cāgamyatvād bhaviṣyataḥ prākṛtānām anadhiṣṭheyatāpatteḥ /
/ candanaṃ cavikā padmakaṃ guḍūci devadāru haridrārdrakam /
/ tadyathā saindhavaṃ sauvarcalaṃ viṭaṃ sāmudraṃ romakam /
/ yāvad āptaṃ dānaṃ snātvā punarasaṃ sparṣaṃ sakṛt snānam iti kaṣāyadānam /
/ tadākhyaṃ punar uccāraprasrāvau stanyayānayāyināṃ vatsakānāṃ viṣe tāv upakārau /
/ jarakucoccārayavāścedakālopayojyatāyāṃ yācakṛtabhaiṣajyasya tadarthaṃ sphareyuḥ nānyāt paribhuñjīt /
/ sānye pi sadbhāvas tadadyācārasya tasmād pūrvakalpena tatsāhye pravṛttiḥ /
/ [50b6] nānāpannasya rūpāntaram apūrvarūpatvaṃ tasmān na visaṃpaccitasya parataḥ svakalpenākalpanam /
/ sampadyate prakṣālanena śaktataṇḍuleṣu pravṛttāvasthānasya svamātrasaṃkhyatā guḍasya /
/ svasaṃbhavatāṃ tatra bhārīkṛtya sūtaṃ vā nidhānam /
/ [51a3] anayaneta svayam upayātre vināśahetor abhāve nusaṃpannasya /
/ dvādaśāṅgulā sādhvī na tīkṣṇā puruṣā vā /
/ sthavikāyāṃ nidhānaṃ mrakṣayitvā sarpiṣā tailena vā /
/ apetatāyāṃ paligodhasya sthitatve ca manojñasya purataḥ khādyabhojyasya mokṣaḥ /
/ rakṣyas saṃsargas tasmād ūne vigatavegatāyāñ ca /
/ prāsādikañ ca sādhu tasmāc chuklanatrakena sūtīkaraṇam /
/ na laśunaṃ palāṇḍuṃ gṛñjanakaṃ vā paribhuñjīta /
/ nopayuñjanaḥ parataś ca saptāhaṃ laśune palāṇḍau trirātram ekarātraṃ gṛñjanavihāraṃ paribhuñjīt /
/ yāvantastā[va?]ntas sannihitāś caturthe saṃmaṃkalpikaśālām vāṅ bhāvakavacanodāhārataḥ /
/ tadyathā drākṣyadāḍimakharjūrākṣoṣṭau vātāma urumānarāmāpikākurumāyikānikocobabhūḥ piñcitikā[52a4]puṣkarañ ca tadākhyam /
/ yato nāgatiḥ śabdasya vihāre tatra kalpakāram āpanam /
/ nābhyām anupānapaṭṭakāc cānyat kaṃsabhājanaṃ pudgalo dhārayet /
/ grahaṇaṃ rakṣāyai pratipādyamānānām apy anyānāṃ samānavyañjanānām /
/ nāpārśvanihitatāṃ prāgāvāt pātra[52b2]sya piṇḍāya pravṛttau bhajet /
/ yathā vṛddhikayā [52b4] niṣādanāya dāpanāya ca mahāsannipāte bhikṣūṇām uddeśaḥ /
/ na yena mantrita tato 'nyasya labdheḥ svīkāre 'sty ayuktatvam /
/ nāntaṃ visarjayet [52b6] dṛṣṭiśīlasampannābhyāmāntasyānyatra yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dānam atiriktasya cālopād yātrākāriṇo grahaṇam /
/ māt[ā]pitṛglānaputrahyāpekṣakukṣīmatībhyo vineyākāṃ kṣāpiṇḍapātaṃ spṛṣṭavate gṛhiṇe ca saṃprāptāya saṃvibhāgaś ca tatḥ karaṇam /
/ na nimantraṇake śraddhadeyatvena pātrādhiṣṭhāne 'syocchiṣṭāśilāṃ yathā sukhakaraṇam /
/ śrāmaṇere ca sārddhaṃ paravadayoge kalpakārakānāṃ piṇḍīkṛtya dānam /
/ nedamito vā dehīti bhojanārtham upaviṣṭapariveṣṭāraṃ bodhayet /
/ tasmān mukham akāle pravāritaś codgārārāme nirmādayed anyaḥ /
/ adurgandhībhāvaprāṇakāsaṃbhavāya kālena kālaṃ śocanaṃ śoṣaṇañ ca /
/ nirdoṣaṃ śūte kukṣeḥ prāgantāt poccanamātraṃ kṛtvāsanaṃ nāto nyaḥ /
